issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Seen on g1 running 1.6. TiMobileSDK 1.4.2.dc7b90

1.Phone>Sound>Local
2.tap play
3.tap the "volume --" button while reading it's value (on button), repeat until the sound is muted

results:0.5, 0.4 etc until after 0.1 you'll see "2.7" reported

{html}
fields.summary: Android: unexpected value when tapping the"volume--" button and the sound value is < 0.1

comments.body:
{html}

turns out this was a tets case issue, since resolved. closing.

{html}
